name: TopTank
description:
You've been tasked with clearing a blockade for your supply train.  Battle your way and clear the area of enemies!

Average Playtime: 15-30 minutes per playthrough

Features:

  • 2D tank based movement
  • Multiple enemy types
  • Adjustable difficulty
  • Original pixel art

First 100 players to share screenshots of their victory screen with me via discord or twitter will get a free MotleyBots NFT.

Twitter | Discord | Website
